short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PomoList is a powerful Chrome extension that helps you create an interactive checklist and includes the Pomodoro Timer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PomoList, a powerful Chrome extension by PomoTodo that helps you create clear interactive checklist, that empowers you to manage your workload and conquer tasks effortlessly. Streamline your work, studies, or chores with our intuitive to-do list creator. The beauty lies in its seamless data persistence.  No more scrambling to remember what you needed to do - PomoList automatically saves your to-do lists, even after you close your tabs. This ensures you can pick up right where you left off, maximizing your productivity and minimizing wasted time.
